rules_text: When this creature enters, each player may surveil 1. [i](They may look at the top card of their library, then they may put it into their graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“We made [/i]public servants[i] out of the stuff! They're spreading this around, and they don't even know it!”
—Brammen, street screecher[/i]
